page.title: 19GAMES, EAST BARKWITH
page.content:
The children at{East Barkwith } primary school play a game called {Red {Rover.}The rules are, that you pick teams,then each team joins hands in a line, facing the other team. Then one team goes up to the other, singing,
"Red Rover, Red Rover, Let Kevin (or someone) come over."
The team then goes back a bit, they grip hands tightly, and the person they named charges at the other team's hands. If the hands stay together, the person joins the opposite team. If they come apart the person goes back to his own team.
